mapper.insert: insert into FINAL_ACCOUNT(NAME, PHONE_NUMBER, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, ACCOUNT_PASSWORD, BALANCE, BANK_ALIAS, TRANSFER_LIMIT) values(#{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{accountNumber}, #{accountPassword}, #{balance}, #{bankAlias}, #{transferLimit})

insert into FINAL_ACCOUNT(PHONE_NUMBER, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, ACCOUNT_PASSWORD, BALANCE, BANK_ALIAS, TRANSFER_LIMIT, NEW_SUBSCRIBE) values(#{phoneNumber}, #{accountNumber}, #{accountPassword}, #{balance}, #{bankAlias}, #{transferLimit}, 'Y')
mapper.update: update final_account set balance = balance - ${transferAmount} where account_number = '${senderAccountNumber}'
update final_account@JIHOON2_BANK set balance = balance - ${transferAmount} where account_number = '${senderAccountNumber}'
update final_account@LEEJH_LINK set balance = balance - ${transferAmount} where account_number = '${senderAccountNumber}'
update final_account@HJIN_LINK set balance = balance - ${transferAmount} where account_number = '${senderAccountNumber}'
update final_account set balance = balance + ${transferAmount} where account_number = '${receiverAccountNumber}'
update final_account@JIHOON2_BANK set balance = balance + ${transferAmount} where account_number = '${receiverAccountNumber}'
update final_account@LEEJH_LINK set balance = balance + ${transferAmount} where account_number = '${receiverAccountNumber}'
update final_account@HJIN_LINK set balance = balance + ${transferAmount} where account_number = '${receiverAccountNumber}'
mapper.select: select TRAN_NUM, WITHDRAWAL_ACCOUNT_NUM, DEPOSIT_ACCOUNT_NUM, WITHDRAWAL_NAME, DEPOSIT_NAME, decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '2', '하나은행', decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '9', '국민은행', decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '14', '신한은행' , decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '20', '우리은행', decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE,'3','카카오'))))) as WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, DEPOSIT_BANK_CODE, WITHDRAWAL_PHONE_NUMBER, DEPOSIT_PHONE_NUMBER, TRAN_AMOUNT, TRAN_DATE, GUEST_GROUP, MEMBER_TYPE, RE_PAY from FINAL_TRANSACTION_HISTORY where DEPOSIT_PHONE_NUMBER = '${phoneNumber}'

select TRAN_NUM, WITHDRAWAL_ACCOUNT_NUM, DEPOSIT_ACCOUNT_NUM, WITHDRAWAL_NAME, DEPOSIT_NAME, decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '2', '하나은행', decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '9', '국민은행', decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '14', '신한은행' , decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '20', '우리은행', decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE,'3','카카오'))))) as WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, DEPOSIT_BANK_CODE, WITHDRAWAL_PHONE_NUMBER, DEPOSIT_PHONE_NUMBER, TRAN_AMOUNT, TRAN_DATE, GUEST_GROUP, MEMBER_TYPE, RE_PAY from FINAL_TRANSACTION_HISTORY where DEPOSIT_PHONE_NUMBER = '${phoneNumber}'

select TRAN_NUM, WITHDRAWAL_ACCOUNT_NUM, DEPOSIT_ACCOUNT_NUM, WITHDRAWAL_NAME, DEPOSIT_NAME, decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '2', '하나은행', decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '9', '국민은행', decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '14', '신한은행' , decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '20', '우리은행')))) as WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, DEPOSIT_BANK_CODE, WITHDRAWAL_PHONE_NUMBER, DEPOSIT_PHONE_NUMBER, TRAN_AMOUNT, TRAN_DATE, GUEST_GROUP, MEMBER_TYPE, RE_PAY from FINAL_TRANSACTION_HISTORY where DEPOSIT_PHONE_NUMBER = '${phoneNumber}' or WITHDRAWAL_PHONE_NUMBER = '${phoneNumber}'

select TRAN_NUM, SUBSTR(WITHDRAWAL_NAME, 0,1)||'*'||SUBSTR(WITHDRAWAL_NAME, 3,1) as WITHDRAWAL_NAME,
SUBSTR(DEPOSIT_NAME, 0,1)||'*'||SUBSTR(DEPOSIT_NAME, 3,1) as DEPOSIT_NAME,
SUBSTR(WITHDRAWAL_ACCOUNT_NUM, 0,2)||'*****-'||SUBSTR(WITHDRAWAL_ACCOUNT_NUM, 10) as WITHDRAWAL_ACCOUNT_NUM,
SUBSTR(DEPOSIT_ACCOUNT_NUM, 0,2)||'*****-'||SUBSTR(DEPOSIT_ACCOUNT_NUM, 10) as DEPOSIT_ACCOUNT_NUM,
decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '2', '하나은행', decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '9', '국민은행', decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '14', '신한은행' , decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '20', '우리은행')))) as WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, decode(DEPOSIT_BANK_CODE, '2', '하나은행', decode(DEPOSIT_BANK_CODE, '9', '국민은행', decode(DEPOSIT_BANK_CODE, '14', '신한은행' , decode(DEPOSIT_BANK_CODE, '20', '우리은행')))) as DEPOSIT_BANK_CODE,
SUBSTR(WITHDRAWAL_PHONE_NUMBER, 0,3)||'-****-'||SUBSTR(WITHDRAWAL_PHONE_NUMBER, 8) as WITHDRAWAL_PHONE_NUMBER,
SUBSTR(DEPOSIT_PHONE_NUMBER, 0,3)||'-****-'||SUBSTR(DEPOSIT_PHONE_NUMBER, 8) as DEPOSIT_PHONE_NUMBER,
TRAN_AMOUNT, TRAN_DATE
from FINAL_TRANSACTION_HISTORY
mapper.update: update FINAL_TRANSACTION_HISTORY set RE_PAY = '완료' where WITHDRAWAL_ACCOUNT_NUM = '${receiverAccountNumber}'
